alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 6:48PM CST until January 26 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Homochitto River At Rosetta affecting Franklin County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Homochitto River at Rosetta. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 18.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 21.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Homochitto River Rosetta 19.0 18.5 Wed 5 pm CST 19.8 10.9 7.0 &&
info.instruction: To escape rising water, take the shortest path to higher ground. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 700 AM CST.
